sqlMap.select: select ERROR_ID, MENU_NAME, ERROR_SUMMARY, ERROR_DESCRIPTION, USER_ID, USER_NAME, to_char(CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:ss') CREATE_DATE from T01_SYS_ERROR_LOG where 1=1 and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%' and MENU_NAME like '%'||#menuName#||'%' order by ERROR_ID desc
select count(1) from T01_SYS_ERROR_LOG where 1=1 and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%' and MENU_NAME like '%'||#menuName#||'%'
sqlMap.insert: insert into T01_SYS_ERROR_LOG (ERROR_ID, MENU_NAME, ERROR_SUMMARY, ERROR_DESCRIPTION, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE) values ('$errorId$', '$menuName$', #errorSummary#, #errorDesc#, '$userId$', '$userName$', sysdate)
